exactMatch.text: Congratulations! We can scan your property. Please proceed to book.
exactMatch.reference: Message displayed when a valid postcode is entered

noCoverage.text: I'm sorry, we don't cover that area yet.
noCoverage.reference: Message displayed when an invalid postcode is entered

emptyMessage.reference: Message displayed when the input is empty or too short

inputLabel.text: What is the first half of your UK postcode?
